name: Lyttelton Historical Museum
openingHours: Lyttelton Museum is closed until further notice. The museum building sustained serious earthquake damage and was subsequently demolished in 2011. The collection is safely stored away until a new place to exhibit is found. In the meantime, the museum is planning a series of distributed displays in Lyttelton and online. For details, see our website or http://www.facebook.com/lytteltonmuseum.
